meanings.definition: Relating to bryology or the study of mosses and liverworts.
meanings.sent1: The bryological research expedition focused on studying different types of mosses.
meanings.sent2: Her bryological knowledge helped her identify the various species of liverworts in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The bryological expert joked that they could find a tiny moss garden in their backyard.
meanings.sent4: The bryological characteristics of the forest floor resembled a lush green carpet.
meanings.sent5: The bryological field guide made it easier to distinguish between mosses and liverworts.

meanings.sent1: The bryological study group examined the unique features of bryophytes in the wetlands.
meanings.sent2: The bryological characteristics of the environment supported the growth of various bryophytes.
meanings.sent3: The bryological enthusiast found a creative way to display bryophytes in a terrarium.
meanings.sent4: The bryological connection between mosses and liverworts fascinated the botanist.
meanings.sent5: The bryological field trip allowed students to observe bryophytes up close.
